attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for restaurant and hotels to take tips from staff
attributes.background:
As a Chef working in the industry, I am disappointed to how hear some restaurants and hotels are taking tips from there staff to top up their employees wage and also to deduct for a so called admin charge.

Lets get the government to pass a law to prevent this from happening.

Thank you.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106533

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
